thread.title: A singer wore a Trump dress at the Grammys, and people loved and hated it
thread.title_full: A singer wore a Trump dress at the Grammys, and people loved and hated it

author: Paul Schrodt
title: A singer wore a Trump dress at the Grammys, and people loved and hated it
text:
print 
Frazer Harrison/Getty 
Singer-songwriter Joy Villa made a political statement on the 2017 Grammys red carpet Sunday night with a President Donald Trump-supporting dress, and it got a lot of reaction from all sides online. 
She took off a white wrap on the red carpet to reveal a red, blue, and white (and bedazzled) dress with Trump's campaign slogan "Make America Great Again" running down it. 
Villa herself went on social media to explain the fashion choice, saying her platform is about "LOVE." 
My whole plate form is about LOVE! I couldn't be where I am today without the love and tenâŚ https://t.co/85y6YjuvjR pic.twitter.com/8Qzui51wMp â Joy Villa (@Joy_Villa) February 12, 2017 
Some were skeptical of Villa's choice, though, including MTV News, which called it the "worst dress" at the Grammys. 
someone named Joy Villa is wearing a pro-Trump dress on the Grammys red carpet https://t.co/GZCdwXWC0C â MTV News (@MTVNews) February 12, 2017 
Â â priscilla (@Sillaxo) February 12, 2017 
Â â kimm-eh!? (@sidekickgirl) February 12, 2017 
Â 
But the musician also found a lot of supporters who encouraged her expression. 
Strong women aren't afraid to stand up for what they believe in. Much respect to you @Joy_Villa for going against the grain. #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/ZYvrfmozYd â Michelle đşđ¸ (@michelle4trump) February 13, 2017 
Â 
RETWEET if you now support Joy Villa for being proud enough to wear a Make America Great Again dress to the #GRAMMYs tonight! I know I do! pic.twitter.com/SqUBE7mSjy â Eric Spracklen (@EricSpracklen) February 13, 2017 
Â 
You go #JoyVilla ! It takes real guts when you're apart of Hollywood to make a political statement! We need more like you ! pic.twitter.com/tlOLIdNxQK â Lisa Rohlfing (@lingling23) February 13, 2017 
Â
